item.title: [do not bump]
item.dc:creator: @Aesyr Aesyr
item.description:
@Aesyr wrote:

[quote=“Mr Google, post:27, topic:392875”][quote author=Aesyr link=topic=490048.msg3595820#msg3595820 date=1305066039]

i can see the writing u said i cant… and i do smoke weed im 14 lol anywayz how i download? its in a text file…

I believe that you smoke weed since you can’t figure out how to download it. Weed kills your brain. You’re living proof.
[/quote]
dude just tell me how 2 download why the hell did u put it in a text file?? just upload the .mqo model its easier/faster in my opinion anyways plz tell me how im making a new server and i wanted to make changes to blade and add to it im adding about 30 customs trying to fit death platebody on 317 … its hard … plz tell me how though idk how :o[/quote]

For some reason, I don’t feel like you would give me credits for the model, considering all the other models you STOLE and RELEASED.

If you knew anything, you could download it. Obviously you don’t know shit about computers, so I don’t believe you should have MY model in YOUR server without credits to me (obviously you didn’t plan on giving any) and then maybe even claiming it as your own.

Removing download link, anyone that wants to download can PM me. Thank Mr. Google and my recent -2 rep.

EDIT: Bump. Updating model in meta right now.

EDIT2: Working on the barricade. When this is finished, a new post will be made.

Read full topic

item.title: [do not bump]
item.dc:creator: @Aesyr Aesyr
item.description:
@Aesyr wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:25, topic:392875”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=490048.msg3595628#msg3595628 date=1305051393]
so many awesome shiz ppl make idk how to use metaseq

:mad: :mad: :mad: i want to learn!~!!!#(!&#!@#%$^
[/quote]

Shut up and press my damn signature.[/quote]
Off topic: @wildskiller ^ Do it. That’s where I learned primitive modeling, and I picked up on it extremely fast. I released a primitive sword (ShadowSting) within 6 hours of seeing it.

On topic: If you’re going to comment, please leave some constructive criticism or rate the model and give reasoning as to why you gave it that rating (if below 10/10, which it should be) or something. At least include the model in your post. No offense to anyone that did already, but from now on I’d like to see more criticism so I can get better and know what everyone wants.

Read full topic

item.title: [do not bump]
item.dc:creator: @Aesyr Aesyr
item.description:
@Aesyr wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:19, topic:392875”][quote author=Aesyr link=topic=490048.msg3594920#msg3594920 date=1304982756]

V4:
Renamed from “Crimson Hero” to “Hellion Blade” fitting the new coloring and shape.

Please comment and rate the model!

It looks like its too small, other then that nothing i can put my finger on. Then again im really tired so, mighth ave to look into it again in the morning. Good try, keep it up.

I created both a 1-handed and 2-handed version. If desired, the 2-handed version can be used as a 1-handed weapon when converted to dat. The 1-handed version was meant to be somewhat short, because imagine trying to hold that sword if it were much longer or bigger, how would that work out? The 2-handed version has had the blade extended a little bit because I did catch that part just today at school, so I made a few quick edits on it.

Thanks.

P.S. I’m also working on a shield to match with the 1-handed version, and then I’m going to make a quest on my 562 server for this weapon where the player will be able to choose between using the gathered materials for a two-handed blade or a one-handed blade with a shield.

You can view any models I plan on releasing at the moment at http://www.xzill.com/personal/

EDIT: Personally, I would go with sword and shield.
[/quote]
Yer, i understand what your saying. It’s just compaired to the handle, the blades rather short. Just my opinion though, think nothing of it.[/quote]

The handle has been shortened as well, they’ll come in 4.1, but for now I need more changes.

EDIT: I had lengthened the blade, and shortened the handle at school on my own. They seem fitting now, and you’re definitely right now that I take a look at the old pictures, some things needed their length messed with.

Read full topic

The 1-handed version was meant to be somewhat short, because imagine trying to hold that sword if it were much longer or bigger, how would that work out? The 2-handed version has had the blade extended a little bit because I did catch that part just today at school, so I made a few quick edits on it.

Thanks.

P.S. I’m also working on a shield to match with the 1-handed version, and then I’m going to make a quest on my 562 server for this weapon where the player will be able to choose between using the gathered materials for a two-handed blade or a one-handed blade with a shield.

You can view any models I plan on releasing at the moment at http://www.xzill.com/personal/

EDIT: Personally, I would go with sword and shield.[/quote]

EDIT: Nevermind, in fact it looks way better now that it’s shaped differently. Attaching blade to hilt…
